title: 1.12.2怎么用function给背包没有指定物品的玩家添加一个tag
author: Errorsans
txt_content:
1.12.2怎么用function给背包没有指定物品的玩家添加一个tag
用function不是命令方块

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Errorsans 发表于 2020-3-18 18:10
抱歉 可能是我没有说清楚
我希望的是可以一个原本拥有那个物品的玩家 在背包没有那个物品后添加指定tag 获 ...
scoreboard players tag @a b
scoreboard players tag @a remove b {Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:stone"}]}

replies.author: xmdhs
Errorsans
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-18 18:02
scoreboard players tag @a a {Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:stone"}]} 
scoreboard players tag @a[tag=!a]  ...
抱歉 可能是我没有说清楚
我希望的是可以一个原本拥有那个物品的玩家 在背包没有那个物品后添加指定tag 获取物品后把tag删去

replies.author: Errorsans
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-18 17:55
scoreboard players tag @a b
scoreboard players tag @a remove b {Inventory:[{id:"minecraft:stone"}]} ...
抱歉 打扰一下 我想问下 怎么让拥有指定物品的玩家失去后获取tag 然后自动给予物品 获取后失去tag

replies.author: xmdhs
